message:
Hi @Pei Fang (Convx) noticed this email template shared talks more on the expiry email -we discussed to prioritize the personalized journey comms on the 12th, are those ready?
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1j6l3lASLWio_fyI0qwaMoxdXsPry8dPY

Journey 1 : Redemption reminder with Expiry Notice - Users with 3/6/9/12 slices
Journey 2 : One slice away reminder with Expiry Notice - Users with 2/5/8/11 slices

Hi @Stallion Rego , this email template is for Journey 1 in sync with Liyana, that based on the slide 11 here
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1rFOOYWtdXeaC7kOI_VpM0wQRJohRcHuxZ_rsd6FnjAo/edit?slide=id.g387b9c06e05_0_0#slide=id.g387b9c06e05_0_0
Could you clarify if this refers to personalized journey comms or it is something else? Also, once the layout and design are confirmed, we will change the copy for Journey 2 using the same format. Basically we are using the same format for both journeys.
Got it, this one actually is a one-time broadcast which is not time bound. We focus on journey 1 and 2 first (Slide #38 and #39).
Also, I just found out Liyana is no longer with PH. Should we liaise directly with Sham moving forward?
Yes, wanted to update you guys on the same. We sort out the creatives ourselves and get it approved from Sham
We can connect tomorrow to finalize the creatives
The new CRM manager will be joining next week 13th
Noted, shall we do tomorrow 10am?
11am please if possible
Yup can
<Media omitted>
Sure @Pei Fang (Convx) the copy sounds good, we can proceed! Please duplicate the existing templates for the changes
Got it! Just to align for the visual that we shared for one-time broadcast, do we send it on 13 Nov or it is not scheduled yet?
We will decide the schedule for that one next month - maybe early nov
Hi @Stallion Rego , we can‚Äôt find the original file of slide 38 in Gdrive that Liyana shared. Just wondering if you have it, or who should we get it from

Hi @Stallion Rego , all copies and visuals are ready, pending to set up. Shall we connect at 3pm today, to go thru it in case anything goes wrong
Can we connect at 2pm? or 3.30pm?
3:30pm sounds good
<Media omitted>
Hey @Stallion Rego, do you have any availability tomorrow 14th Oct (Tuesday) after 330pm? We can jump right into Abandonment Cart Journey based on our plan <This message was edited>

Also a quick heads-up. Our designer will be out for wed-fri this week. So, one of the visuals for abandonment cart journey might not make it in time. Though we can still move ahead with setting up the flow and content logic first, then slot in the visual next week when its ready. How does that sound with you?
Hi @Brendan Zhi noted on this, the flow is setup last time - we just need to slot in the visual next week
Won't be available next week - maybe we can connect on Wed to go over the other use cases
Do you mean tomorrow not available? Sorry confuse by your reply üòÖ
Yes tomorrow, sorry
This Wednesday. I'll only be available before 330pm or after 430pm
We can do 2pm if that fits your time?
Lets do first half? 11 or 12?
11am sounds good to me. Let's lock that in
Hi @Brendan Zhi hope you had a good deepavali break. Wanted to check when we can add on the cart abandon creative?
Hi Stallon, apologies. My message didn't go through. @Pei Fang (Convx) will be liasing with our designer on the creative. Will get this up by end of this week.
Just curious. If I recalled correctly. There are offline meet up with PH team supposing tomorrow or that is no longer the case?
Hey Brendan - Sham just got back from her leaves today. I'll follow up and confirm a time.

@Pei Fang (Convx) @Brendan Zhi here is the report I've prepared for the meeting for your reference. At the end of these slides we will present the opportunities - the entire CRM plan + high impact initiatives.

Or no action. Basically just swapped the presentation slide after you shared yours based on your flow
Just share your ppt version with me - I will incorporate into these slides.
It's in the email that I shared last Friday üôèüèº
Yup its a pdf - can you share the ppt version
Oh my bad. Gimme a moment. Will forward to you
Hi Stallon, I've forwarded to you via email. Please check üëåüèº
Received, thanks Brendan
Hi @Pei Fang (Convx) @Brendan Zhi I am connecting with Asyila later to discuss the automation journeys plan. It would be great if you guys can join in too. Later today at 3pm.
Hi @Stallion Rego , I have another meeting clash at 3pm, would any other time today work instead?
Okay no problem - will connect with you guys later

Hi @Stallion Rego , a quick update on the cart abandon visual - the creative will be ready by next Monday. Shall we schedule a time to set up and go through what‚Äôs been discussed with Asyila as well?

Morning @Pei Fang (Convx) we need to connect on the Hut Rewards expiry plan as well. Are you free today second half?
Phase 1 - Early Awareness (1 email / month) - Oct
- Added expiry reminder in the the existing personalised reward reminder (12th of the month) ‚úÖ
Phase 2 - Aggressive Reminder (2 emails / month) - Nov
- Standalone email with expiry reminder on 1st week of Nov
- Personalised email with reminder on 12th of the month
- Nudges on the app/web for additional visibility
Phase 3 - Final Reminder (3 emails / month) - Dec
- Standalone email in the first week
- Personalised email with reminder on 12th of the month
- Final reminder after 20th Dec
- Additional nudges on the app/web throughout the month <This message was edited>
Yup, would 2pm today work for you?

Hi @Stallion Rego , I‚Äôve slot in the visual for Abandon Cart Journey 2025, under content - ID 1258. This will be the second email, sent 24 hours after the first one. I believe the EDM, web push & app push sent 15 minutes after atc will be continue using the current version yeah?
Hi @Pei Fang (Convx) we can use the existing creatives for the app and web push
Hi @Stallion Rego, yup, let us set it up. Meanwhile would you open to call anytime tomorrow? Apart from 3:30-4:30pm

Yep, let‚Äôs do today 3pm

I'll walk you through

Okay great

Okay no worries - I'll connect with her and update you guys
Sounds good, thanks Stallon!

Hi @Pei Fang (Convx) hope you are preparing the new user journey overview for Asyila. Can we connect today to go over the same and make sure its full proof?

Sure, we will start prepping the content. Thanks for the heads up Stallon

Yes, the segment and campaign

Campaign name: Sooka Campaign

Okay I hope these conversations are being documented. If there are delays in finalization make sure its documented yeah
Hi @Brendan Zhi @Pei Fang (Convx) thanks for joining the call - lets share the minutes and next steps for Asyila and wait for her response on the initiatives she wants us to drive this month.
Chat with meeting transcript: [https://notes.granola.ai/t/97e49d61-3533-44c7-b119-0ea19c5851a1](https://notes.granola.ai/t/97e49d61-3533-44c7-b119-0ea19c5851a1)

Also, I feel we should drive an AB test for the late-lunch opportunity we identified last time. Aileen liked it and it won't take much time to push out a few Push Notifications to test the waters. A quick win perhaps if it works.
Thanks Stallon for sharing this. Yup sounds good, let us start prepping that details out
Could you share on what‚Äôs the structure of the naming, and what should we name it for SOOKA campaign for example? For the segment number, do you mean we can only justify it based on CDP?

Yup, the value management dashboard that they have built is based on the segments created via CDP. Basically they match the activation name on CDP to the list used in our campaign.
Campaign sample: VV CRM - LTO - EDM - 261125 - SOOKA CAMPAIGN - ENGAGEMENT - KLANG
Alrightt noted that
<Media omitted>
What would you recommend in naming convention?
Here follow this ^
For example : VV CRM - VALUE - APN - 091225 - 2 FOR RM22 - CONVERSION - ALL APP USER

We try to tag the campaign category based on the following:
- VALUE - for app only deals or cheaper value offers
- LTO - for limited time only menu promos
- TACTICAL - if targeted to a specific group / segment
- ADHOC - for other one time requests not tied to any campaign

Hi @Jonas Lim (Convx)
Requesting the team to please try and update roadmap with KPIs on weekly basis?
This will be a single source of truth to have no conflicts in future- I am taking buy in from Pizza hut on this so that October type situation never arises in future.

2. Segments/List target name --> I have used (ID-1203 Active App Users && ID-1097 VV_Active 90D_660215)

2. App Users (someone who install & engaged) / Partial App users (someone who install but didn't engage)

Sure Brendan, allow me to check and update you
Awesome. Thanks

I'm available

cool lets connect here

No problem, let us prep that
Hi @Brendan Zhi @Pei Fang (Convx) would recommend using some of the netcore features in the campaigns we are executing - for e.g countdown timer template for 1212 last call apn
Ok sounds interesting. Can you please point and show some examples on how that works?
<Media omitted>
<Media omitted>
You will have a change template option at the top above the title
<Media omitted>
The time to live you need to keep within the timer end time. E.g. if timer ends on 12th 11pm then your TTL on schedule page should be 12th 11pm or 10pm
<Media omitted>

Hi @Stallion Rego , could you grant the access to Brendan and I for setting up app nudges, so that we can assist on the execution when it‚Äôs needed. I believe it should be under Engage > Personalization > App
Hi @Pei Fang (Convx) yes I'll walk you guys through today on how to setup nudges. Are you guys free around 5pm?

Hi @Jonas Lim (Convx) @Cheng Pin (Convx) @Pei Fang (Convx) @Brendan Zhi we have aligned with Sham to have a business review and roadmap planning session in week of 12th Jan 2026. We will first run through the plan with Sham online and then schedule for the session with Aileen in person the following week.
Let's create a comprehensive data-driven roadmap with potential opportunities that we identify backed by projected uplift that we can bring in 2026. We will voice out the plans, get feedback and then lock it in with clear timelines for both sides to strictly follow.
I will help put together the data for what has been done so far but would need your expertise on the road-mapping.
Hi Stallon, would tomorrow 3-4pm work for you instead?
Hi @Pei Fang (Convx) I have a call at that time anytime before or after 3-4 works

Hi Team - Wishing you all a Happy New Year. Hope everyone had a good break üí™üèº
As discussed, we are scheduling a two hour workshop with Sham and team for planning out the next 5 months where we share them clear opportunities and impact. Let's connect this week to review the same internally first - what would be a good time?
Hi @Stallion Rego , could we do this Thursday 2pm for internal sync?
Hi @85723336159279 Yes works for me <This message was edited>
